name: Revolver Shooting Range: Magnum .44 - Accuracy & Reflex Target Shooting Game.
name_original: Revolver Shooting Range: Magnum .44 - Accuracy & Reflex Target Shooting Game.
description: A revolver is a repeating firearm that has a revolving cylinder containing multiple chambers and at least one barrel for firing. The term "revolver" refers to a handgun, but other weapons may also have a revolving chamber. These include some models of grenade launchers, shotguns, and rifles.Though the original name was revolving gun, the short-hand "revolver" is universally used. (Cannon using this mechanism are known as revolver cannon.)
